meanings.definition: The days of the week from Monday to Friday, typically excluding weekends.
meanings.sent1: I have to work on weekdays, but I enjoy my weekends off.
meanings.sent2: Most people have a routine on weekdays, such as going to work or school.
meanings.sent3: On weekdays, the city streets are bustling with people rushing to their destinations.
meanings.sent4: The weekdays are like a marathon, with each day feeling like a different leg of the race.
meanings.sent5: During weekdays, the sun rises and sets, marking the passage of time.
